themes: loss of young and emerging artists
need for balanced support across artist demographics
key_phrases: Austin shifted its model so that its priority was SOLELY to support art from underrepresented communities
that is a GREAT and IMPORTANT priority, but it shouldn't be the only priority
Artists across the board are struggling
we're losing the generation of young, talented artists
only the old and established, the young and trust-funded, or the young and have-a-job-in-tech can afford to make the art
barriers_identified: funding perceived as exclusive to underrepresented communities
high cost of living in Austin
economic barriers for artists without independent wealth or tech jobs
solutions_proposed: broaden funding priorities to support a wider range of artists
